result.purpose: This file is a command-line tool for decoding HCL (HashiCorp Configuration Language) files and outputting the results in JSON format.
side_effects: Reads from standard input if no HCL files are provided.
Writes output to standard output or a specified file.
Exits the program with an error code on failure.
risks: Potential for command injection if user input is not properly validated.
File handling errors if the specified files do not exist or are inaccessible.
